Sentence: lawyers in texas are trying to keep their client from becoming the 300th person executed in the state since 1982 , when texas resumed capital punishment. they 're asking the supreme court to block tonight 's scheduled execution of delma banks. banks was convicted of shooting and killing a 16-year-old at a park in 1980. his lawyers say his trial attorney did a bad job and the prosecutors improperly kept african americans off his jury. he 'd be the 11th killer put to death in texas this year .

extent: lawyers in texas are trying to keep their client from becoming the 300th person executed in the state since 1982, when texas resumed capital punishment
